name: SmartHMA
short_description:
The main objective of the SmartHMA project is to develop and validate an open source operational platform architecture which implements a set of HMA standards in native client for access to Ground Segment data and services. 

The aim of the project is the development of a mobile platform for distribution of existing EO data and services and those that will be introduced in the near future, in the form that will be acceptable by mobile devices (mainly tablets). Implementation will be focused on adaptation of EO-DAIL environment to changing user needs associated with new user behaviours and growing market of mobile devices. SmartHMA in form of open source software allows complementing the RSS system environment and EO-DAIL/SSE platform.
summary: Mobile implementation of HMA standardised EO data sources
